Text:
Stop uploading crap.
This mkv would keep crashing my explorer, i had to reboot in safe mode to deleted it.

Becareful, suspicious.

I highly doubt that. I've gotten most of this series as well as a few others from this uploader. ALL have been excellent quality!  Keep up the great work! 


I could still use a 720 WEB-DL of eps 18 & 12 if you wouldn't mind. Maybe I'm overlooking them? Thanks!
